item.wandrous.accelerate_cast.desc: Projectile spells gain a speed boost
item.wandrous.add_mana.desc: Gives a mana boost to the next cast
item.wandrous.bestow_blessing_boost_heal: Blesses the target with more maximum health
item.wandrous.bestow_blessing_haste.desc: Blesses the target with faster mining speed
item.wandrous.bestow_blessing_night_visi: Blesses the target with night vision
item.wandrous.bestow_blessing_regenerati: Blesses the target with health regeneration
item.wandrous.bestow_blessing_resist_fir: Blesses the target with immunity against fire
item.wandrous.bestow_blessing_resistance: Blesses the target with damage resistance
item.wandrous.bestow_blessing_speed.desc: Blesses the target with faster movement speed
item.wandrous.bestow_curse_darkness.desc: Curses the target with limited vision
item.wandrous.bestow_curse_glow.desc: Curses the target making it have a shiny aura
item.wandrous.bestow_curse_levitate.desc: Curses the target making it ascend to the heavens
item.wandrous.bestow_curse_mining_fatigu: Curses the target with reduced mining speed
item.wandrous.bestow_curse_of_big.desc: Curses the target and makes them big
item.wandrous.bestow_curse_of_small.desc: Curses the target and makes them small
item.wandrous.bestow_curse_silence.desc: Curses the target with silence, making it unable to cast magic
item.wandrous.bestow_curse_slowness.desc: Curses the target with reduced movement speed
item.wandrous.bestow_curse_weakness.desc: Curses the target with reduced damage
item.wandrous.big_delay_cast.desc: Casts another spell after quite some time
item.wandrous.black_hole.desc: A slow orb of void that consumes blocks
item.wandrous.bloodlust.desc: Spells gain a huge damage buff but can also hit you
item.wandrous.bomb.desc: Throws a bomb that damages foes
item.wandrous.boomerang.desc: Makes a projectile return towards the caster
item.wandrous.chain_shot.desc: A projectile that bounces around targets
item.wandrous.chainsaw.desc: A good way to get rid of trees
item.wandrous.collect.desc: Collects items and teleports them to the caster
item.wandrous.critical_plus.desc: Increases the chance to do critical damage
item.wandrous.damage_plus.desc: Increases the damage of the spells
item.wandrous.decrease_recharge_time.des: Reduces the cast and recharge times
item.wandrous.delta.desc: Casts a copy of the first spell in the wand
item.wandrous.divide_by_2.desc: Casts 2 copies of a spell but its damage is reduced to a half
item.wandrous.divide_by_3.desc: Casts 3 copies of a spell but its damage is reduced to a third
item.wandrous.divide_by_4.desc: Casts 4 copies of a spell but its damage is reduced to a forth
item.wandrous.double_cast.desc: Casts 2 spells at the same time
item.wandrous.double_split_cast.desc: Casts 2 spells at the same time with different directions
item.wandrous.faltering.desc: Reduces the invincibility frames (i-frames) given to the target after a hit
item.wandrous.freezing_charge.desc: It is cold to the touch
item.wandrous.freezing_gaze.desc: Creates ice walls and freeze entities in a cone
item.wandrous.friends_to_power.desc: Makes spells stronger the more friends you have
item.wandrous.giga_drill.desc: Bigger and therefore better (ROW ROW FIGHT THE POWER !!)
item.wandrous.glyph_of_triggering.desc: Triggers a spell once an entity steps on it, barely visible to other players
item.wandrous.guide.desc: Makes a projectile follow the caster look direction
item.wandrous.gust.desc: Conjures a burst of air that send entities flying
item.wandrous.health_to_power.desc: Consumes the caster's life force to make spells stronger
item.wandrous.heavy_shot.desc: Increases the damage of the projectile at the cost of the speed
item.wandrous.heavy_spread.desc: Increases the spread on spells, but reduces de cast and recharge times
item.wandrous.home_bringer_teleport.desc: Teleports a entity towards the caster
item.wandrous.homing.desc: Makes a projectile move towards enemies
item.wandrous.igneous_gaze.desc: Spread flames and ignites entities in a cone
item.wandrous.kappa.desc: Copies all the modifiers in the wand
item.wandrous.lambda.desc: Casts a copy of the last spell in the wand
item.wandrous.light_shot.desc: Increases the speed of the projectile at the cost of the damage
item.wandrous.long_distance_cast.desc: Casts a spell from further away from the caster
item.wandrous.medium_delay_cast.desc: Casts another spell after some time
item.wandrous.nuke.desc: How'd you get your hands in this...
item.wandrous.piercing.desc: Makes a projectile go through other entities
item.wandrous.plasma_beam.desc: An sudden and violent beam of radiant light
item.wandrous.quad_split_cast.desc: Casts 4 spells at the same time with different directions
item.wandrous.small_delay_cast.desc: Casts another spell after a little time
item.wandrous.spread_cast.desc: Casts a spell in a random location within range
item.wandrous.summon_bee_swarm.desc: Summons 4 bees that pursue the last hit target
item.wandrous.summon_wolf_pack.desc: Summons 4 wolves that pursue the last hit target
item.wandrous.swap_teleport.desc: Swaps the caster's position with another entity
item.wandrous.teleport_cast.desc: Casts a spell from another entity position
item.wandrous.timer_black_hole.desc: A slow orb of void that consumes blocks and casts a spell once it expires
item.wandrous.timer_chain_shot.desc: A Projectile that bounces around targets and casts a spell once it expires
item.wandrous.timer_fireball.desc: A fiery orb that casts a spell once it expires
item.wandrous.timer_glimmering_bolt.desc: A shiny arcane projectile that casts a spell once it expires
item.wandrous.timer_sonic_boom.desc: A sonically charged shriek that casts a spell once it expires
item.wandrous.tnt_minecart.desc: Summons a minecart that can unleash a explosion
item.wandrous.trigger_chain_shot.desc: A Projectile that bounces around targets and casts a spell upon collision
item.wandrous.trigger_fireball.desc: A fiery orb that casts a spell upon collision
item.wandrous.trigger_glimmering_bolt.de: A shiny arcane projectile that casts a spell upon collision
item.wandrous.trigger_sonic_boom.desc: A sonically charged shriek that casts a spell upon collision
item.wandrous.triple_cast.desc: Casts 3 spells at the same time
item.wandrous.triple_split_cast.desc: Casts 3 spells at the same time with different directions
item.wandrous.wand.no_mana: Not enough mana to cast spells
wandrous.map.dungeon.lore: A map to a ancient dungeon told to hold some arcane secrets
